text: @SenBobCasey @Bamafanaticfan1 Put your money where your mouth is Bobbie! Go buy an AR-15 and time the process, then go expose yourself to the COVID-19 virus, develop symptoms, then seek to be tested and time the process. Let’s us know the outcome. Until then, stop spreading your propaganda.
